I think the highest I've ever gotten my AP on Veigar in a legitimate game was something like 1600. It was an hour and half long game where we had a Support Lux vs their Ziggs mid with stupid waveclear with neither team having any reliable hard engage. So we kind of just sat in a cold war staring at each other in mid lane, occasionally skirmishing around Dragon or Baron until I finally caught their Vayne in an Event Horizon and killed her with a single W, allowing us to pretty much just run at them and pick them off as they retreated.

It was pretty funny chunking a tank for a third of their health with nothing but my Q. I wish I had gotten screenshots of the score screen.
